title: Didnt get neither Doomed minion icon nor little devil teemo
body: Didnt get neither of the two icons although i did play the minigame and just won a doom bots game

replies.body:
first of all: gay
second of all: still haven't{{champion:32}}  gotten it ither

According to the [mini-site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016/sacrifice-minions), it's going to take up to 2 weeks to receive the doomed minion icon- after November 3rd.  Hang tight and the goodies will come!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MG8jRikY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T16:26:19.206+0000)
>
> According to the [mini-site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016/sacrifice-minions), it's going to take up to 2 weeks to receive the doomed minion icon- after November 3rd.  Hang tight and the goodies will come!

The way I read that, it means everyone has to wait until after November 3rd to get the icon. yet I played the game and got the icon within an hour.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MG8jRikY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T16:26:19.206+0000)
>
> According to the [mini-site](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016/sacrifice-minions), it's going to take up to 2 weeks to receive the doomed minion icon- after November 3rd.  Hang tight and the goodies will come!

What about the Little Devil Teemo icon, i won a doom bots game.
Yeah mostly about this icon..the other i knew,but the little devil teemo..we should have gotten it when we won the game..or after a few hours...i won about 4 hours ago..but still no icon
Yup. it's going to take at least a week after November 3rd to roll everything out to eligible players.  Hope that helps clear things up!
